name: ANTdemia
description:
ANTdemia

A simple two-player simulation game made with PICO-8. It aims to make awareness of the importance of social distancing during epidemics.

In a world where ants can spread a very contagious virus, humans have to survive by collecting medicine from different locations. Avoid getting infected in order to beat the virus!

CONTROLS

Player1 - Arrow keys to move.

Player2 - Mouse to move.
    Left click to drop infected ants.

HOW TO PLAY

Player1 wins by collecting all the items.

Player2 wins by infecting Player1.
